mods.abstract: Khufu (Cheops) Pyramid at Gizeh. Four Egyptian camel riders and a donkey with an Egyptian boy before the Great Pyramid, constructed ca. 2560-2540 B.C.E.; "Zangaki Pyramide de Guizeh" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
